creator: Paul.Duggan@ipaccess.com
text:
The following target worked on v1.4.1(both paths jarred) but does not on v1.5. 
Only the first jar task appears to be run and the second one is ignored.

    <target name="jar" depends="java.compile,jar.prepare" >
        <jar jarfile="${ipaccess.omcr.jar}" 
             basedir="${clsDir}"
             includes="com/**"/>
        
        <jar jarfile="${ipaccess.omcr.jar}" 
             basedir="${nanoOmcrDir}" 
             update="true" 
             includes="resources/**"/>
    </target>

creator: klaus.ruehl@sun.com
text:
see Bug #10755
